content: **this listing is for the pdf download not a finished product** soap cozies are great for extending the life of your bar of soap eco friendly and gentle on your skin knit one for yourself or a friend with this quick and easy pattern size approx 3x5 pattern + download - please note this listing is for a pattern only - pattern is written in us terms - this pattern will be delivered via email as a download link or can be downloaded in your library on ravelry skill level - knitting - beginner - requires knowledge of knit and purl stitches what will i need - 40-50 yards of worsted weight 100% cotton yarn - us 8 / 5 0mm needles - measuring tape - yarn needle - scissors follow along please follow and tag @kneedlesandlife on instagram for your work to be featured i would love to see your own soap cozies being made and the colors you choose copyright this pattern and pictures are the property of kalley reedy and may not be altered and sold the use of patterns/ pictures for resale purposes is prohibited you may sell the finished product but give credit to the designer in your online listings and use your own photos you may sell in person without credit you can also find this pattern for free on my blog kneedlesandlife com but there will be ads and it is not printable
